title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 78 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 78 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Give ear, O my people, to my law: incline your ears to the words of my mouth.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的训诲诗）我的民哪，你门要留心听我的训诲，侧耳听我口中的话。

lineList.en: I will open my mouth in a parable: I will utter dark sayings of old:
lineList.cn: 我要开口说比喻。我要说出古时的谜语。

lineList.en: Which we have heard and known, and our fathers have told us.
lineList.cn: 是我们所听见所知道的，也是我们的祖宗告诉我们的。

lineList.en: We will not hide them from their children, shewing to the generation to come the praises of the LORD, and his strength, and his wonderful works that he hath done.
lineList.cn: 我们不将这些事向他们的子孙隐瞒。要将耶和华的美德和他的能力，并他奇妙的作为，述说给后代听。

lineList.en: For he established a testimony in Jacob, and appointed a law in Israel, which he commanded our fathers, that they should make them known to their children:
lineList.cn: 因为他在雅各中立法度，在以色列中设律法，是他吩咐我们祖宗，要传给子孙的。

lineList.en: That the generation to come might know them, even the children which should be born; who should arise and declare them to their children:
lineList.cn: 使将要生的后代子孙，可以晓得。他们也要起来告诉他们的子孙。

lineList.en: That they might set their hope in God, and not forget the works of God, but keep his commandments:
lineList.cn: 好叫他们仰望神，不忘记神的作为。惟要守他的命令。

lineList.en: And might not be as their fathers, a stubborn and rebellious generation; a generation that set not their heart aright, and whose spirit was not stedfast with God.
lineList.cn: 不要像他们的祖宗，是顽梗悖逆居心不正之辈，向着神心不诚实。

lineList.en: The children of Ephraim, being armed, and carrying bows, turned back in the day of battle.
lineList.cn: 以法莲的子孙，带着兵器，拿着弓，临阵之日，转身退后。

lineList.en: They kept not the covenant of God, and refused to walk in his law;
lineList.cn: 他们不遵守神的约，不肯照他的律法行。

lineList.en: And forgat his works, and his wonders that he had shewed them.
lineList.cn: 又忘记他所行的，和他显给他们奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: Marvellous things did he in the sight of their fathers, in the land of Egypt, in the field of Zoan.
lineList.cn: 他在埃及地，在琐安田，在他们祖宗的眼前，施行奇事。

lineList.en: He divided the sea, and caused them to pass through; and he made the waters to stand as an heap.
lineList.cn: 他将海分裂，使他们过去。又叫水立起如垒。

lineList.en: In the daytime also he led them with a cloud, and all the night with a light of fire.
lineList.cn: 他白日用云彩，终夜用火光，引导他们。

lineList.en: He clave the rocks in the wilderness, and gave them drink as out of the great depths.
lineList.cn: 他在旷野分裂磐石，多多的给他们水喝，如从深渊而出。

lineList.en: He brought streams also out of the rock, and caused waters to run down like rivers.
lineList.cn: 他使水从磐石涌出，叫水如江河下流。

lineList.en: And they sinned yet more against him by provoking the most High in the wilderness.
lineList.cn: 他们却仍旧得罪他，在乾燥之地悖逆至高者。

lineList.en: And they tempted God in their heart by asking meat for their lust.
lineList.cn: 他们心中试探神，随自己所欲的求食物。

lineList.en: Yea, they spake against God; they said, Can God furnish a table in the wilderness?
lineList.cn: 并且妄论神，说，神在旷野岂能摆设筵席吗。

lineList.en: Behold, he smote the rock, that the waters gushed out, and the streams overflowed; can he give bread also? can he provide flesh for his people?
lineList.cn: 他曾击打磐石，使水涌出，成了江河。他还能赐粮食吗。还能为他的百姓豫备肉吗。

lineList.en: Therefore the LORD heard this, and was wroth: so a fire was kindled against Jacob, and anger also came up against Israel;
lineList.cn: 所以耶和华听见，就发怒。有烈火向雅各烧起，有怒气向以色列上腾。

lineList.en: Because they believed not in God, and trusted not in his salvation:
lineList.cn: 因为他们不信服神，不倚赖他的救恩。

lineList.en: Though he had commanded the clouds from above, and opened the doors of heaven,
lineList.cn: 他却吩咐天空，又敞开天上的门。

lineList.en: And had rained down manna upon them to eat, and had given them of the corn of heaven.
lineList.cn: 降吗哪像雨给他们吃，将天上的粮食赐给他们。

lineList.en: Man did eat angels' food: he sent them meat to the full.
lineList.cn: 各人或作人吃大能者的食物。他赐下粮食，使他们饱足。

lineList.en: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven: and by his power he brought in the south wind.
lineList.cn: 他领东风起在天空，又用能力引了南风来。

lineList.en: He rained flesh also upon them as dust, and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:
lineList.cn: 他降肉像雨在他们当中，多如尘土，又降飞鸟，多如海沙。

lineList.en: And he let it fall in the midst of their camp, round about their habitations.
lineList.cn: 落在他们的营中，在他们住处的四面。

lineList.en: So they did eat, and were well filled: for he gave them their own desire;
lineList.cn: 他们吃了，而且饱足。这样，就随了他们所欲的。

lineList.en: They were not estranged from their lust. But while their meat was yet in their mouths,
lineList.cn: 他们贪而无厌，食物还在他们口中的时候，

lineList.en: The wrath of God came upon them, and slew the fattest of them, and smote down the chosen men of Israel.
lineList.cn: 神的怒气，就向他们上腾，杀了他们内中的肥壮人。打倒以色列的少年人。

lineList.en: For all this they sinned still, and believed not for his wondrous works.
lineList.cn: 虽是这样，他们仍旧犯罪，不信他奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: Therefore their days did he consume in vanity, and their years in trouble.
lineList.cn: 因此他叫他们的日子，全归虚空，叫他们的年岁，尽属惊恐。

lineList.en: When he slew them, then they sought him: and they returned and enquired early after God.
lineList.cn: 他杀他们的时候，他们才求问他，回心转意，切切的寻求神。

lineList.en: And they remembered that God was their rock, and the high God their redeemer.
lineList.cn: 他们也追念神是他们的磐石，至高的神，是他们的救赎主。

lineList.en: Nevertheless they did flatter him with their mouth, and they lied unto him with their tongues.
lineList.cn: 他们却用口馅媚他，用舌向他说谎。

lineList.en: For their heart was not right with him, neither were they stedfast in his covenant.
lineList.cn: 因他们的心向他不正，在他的约上，也不忠心。

lineList.en: But he, being full of compassion, forgave their iniquity, and destroyed them not: yea, many a time turned he his anger away, and did not stir up all his wrath.
lineList.cn: 但他有怜悯，赦免他们的罪孽，不灭绝他们。而且屡次消他的怒气，不发尽他的忿怒。

lineList.en: For he remembered that they were but flesh; a wind that passeth away, and cometh not again.
lineList.cn: 他想到他们不过是血气，是一阵去而不返的风。

lineList.en: How oft did they provoke him in the wilderness, and grieve him in the desert!
lineList.cn: 他们在旷野悖逆他，在荒地叫他担忧，何其多呢。

lineList.en: Yea, they turned back and tempted God, and limited the Holy One of Israel.
lineList.cn: 他们再三试探神，惹动以色列的圣者。

lineList.en: They remembered not his hand, nor the day when he delivered them from the enemy.
lineList.cn: 他们不追念他的能力（原文作手），和赎他们脱离敌人的日子。

lineList.en: How he had wrought his signs in Egypt, and his wonders in the field of Zoan:
lineList.cn: 他怎样在埃及地显神迹，在琐安田显奇事。

lineList.en: And had turned their rivers into blood; and their floods, that they could not drink.
lineList.cn: 把他们的江河，并河汊的水，都变为血，使他们不能喝。

lineList.en: He sent divers sorts of flies among them, which devoured them; and frogs, which destroyed them.
lineList.cn: 他叫苍蝇成群，落在他们当中，吸尽他们。又叫青蛙灭了他们。

lineList.en: He gave also their increase unto the caterpiller, and their labour unto the locust.
lineList.cn: 把他们的土产交给蚂蚱，把他们辛苦得来的交给蝗虫。

lineList.en: He destroyed their vines with hail, and their sycomore trees with frost.
lineList.cn: 他降冰雹打坏他们的葡萄树。下严霜打坏他们的桑树。

lineList.en: He gave up their cattle also to the hail, and their flocks to hot thunderbolts.
lineList.cn: 又把他们的牲畜交给冰雹，把他们的群畜交给闪电。

lineList.en: He cast upon them the fierceness of his anger, wrath, and indignation, and trouble, by sending evil angels among them.
lineList.cn: 他使猛烈的怒气，和忿怒，恼恨，苦难，成了一群降灾的使者，临到他们。

lineList.en: He made a way to his anger; he spared not their soul from death, but gave their life over to the pestilence;
lineList.cn: 他为自己的怒气修平了路，将他们交给瘟疫，使他们死亡。

lineList.en: And smote all the firstborn in Egypt; the chief of their strength in the tabernacles of Ham:
lineList.cn: 在埃及击杀一切长子，在含的帐棚中，击杀他们强壮时头生的。

lineList.en: But made his own people to go forth like sheep, and guided them in the wilderness like a flock.
lineList.cn: 他却领出自己的民如羊，在旷野引他们如羊群。

lineList.en: And he led them on safely, so that they feared not: but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.
lineList.cn: 他领他们稳稳妥妥的，使他们不至害怕。海却淹没他们的仇敌。

lineList.en: And he brought them to the border of his sanctuary, even to this mountain, which his right hand had purchased.
lineList.cn: 他带他们到自己圣地的边界，到他右手所得的这山地。

lineList.en: He cast out the heathen also before them, and divided them an inheritance by line, and made the tribes of Israel to dwell in their tents.
lineList.cn: 他在他们面前赶出外邦人，用绳子将外邦的地量给他们为业，叫以色列支派的人，住在他们的帐棚里。

lineList.en: Yet they tempted and provoked the most high God, and kept not his testimonies:
lineList.cn: 他们仍旧试探悖逆至高的神，不守他的法度。

lineList.en: But turned back, and dealt unfaithfully like their fathers: they were turned aside like a deceitful bow.
lineList.cn: 反倒退后，行诡诈，像他们的祖宗一样。他们改变，如同翻背的弓。

lineList.en: For they provoked him to anger with their high places, and moved him to jealousy with their graven images.
lineList.cn: 因他们的邱坛，惹了他的怒气，因他们雕刻的偶像，触动他的愤恨。

lineList.en: When God heard this, he was wroth, and greatly abhorred Israel:
lineList.cn: 神听见，就发怒，极其憎恶以色列人。

lineList.en: So that he forsook the tabernacle of Shiloh, the tent which he placed among men;
lineList.cn: 甚至他离弃示罗的帐幕，就是他在人间所搭的帐棚。

lineList.en: And delivered his strength into captivity, and his glory into the enemy's hand.
lineList.cn: 又将他的约柜原文作能力交与人掳去，将他的荣耀交在敌人手中。

lineList.en: He gave his people over also unto the sword; and was wroth with his inheritance.
lineList.cn: 并将他的百姓交与刀剑，向他的产业发怒。

lineList.en: The fire consumed their young men; and their maidens were not given to marriage.
lineList.cn: 少年人被火烧灭。处女也无喜歌。

lineList.en: Their priests fell by the sword; and their widows made no lamentation.
lineList.cn: 祭司倒在刀下。寡妇却不哀哭。

lineList.en: Then the LORD awaked as one out of sleep, and like a mighty man that shouteth by reason of wine.
lineList.cn: 那时主像世人睡醒，像勇士饮酒呼喊。

lineList.en: And he smote his enemies in the hinder parts: he put them to a perpetual reproach.
lineList.cn: 他就打退了他的敌人，叫他们永蒙羞辱。

lineList.en: Moreover he refused the tabernacle of Joseph, and chose not the tribe of Ephraim:
lineList.cn: 并且他弃掉约瑟的帐棚，不拣选以法莲支派，

lineList.en: But chose the tribe of Judah, the mount Zion which he loved.
lineList.cn: 却拣选犹大支派，他所喜爱的锡安山。

lineList.en: And he built his sanctuary like high palaces, like the earth which he hath established for ever.
lineList.cn: 盖造他的圣所，好像高峰，又像他建立永存之地。

lineList.en: He chose David also his servant, and took him from the sheepfolds:
lineList.cn: 又拣选他的仆人大卫，从羊圈中将他召来。

lineList.en: From following the ewes great with young he brought him to feed Jacob his people, and Israel his inheritance.
lineList.cn: 叫他不再跟从那些带奶的母羊，为要牧养自己的百姓雅各，和自己的产业以色列。

lineList.en: So he fed them according to the integrity of his heart; and guided them by the skilfulness of his hands.
lineList.cn: 于是他按心中的纯正，牧养他们，用手中的巧妙，引导他们。
